/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees and power lines, stretches out into the distance. A blue truck is parked on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. On the left side of the street, a building stands tall, its facade partially obscured by the trees. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. In the far distance, mountains can be seen, adding depth and a sense of scale to the image. The colors in the image are mostly green and brown, reflecting the natural and urban elements of the scene.
